message.content:
cs.AI, cs.RO, cs.SY, cs.NE, cs.LG

Reasoning: 
1. cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) - The paper proposes a new action selection mechanism for software simulated agents, which falls under the domain of AI.
2. cs.RO (Robotics) - The proposed mechanism can be applied to robotics, as it involves selecting actions for an agent to perform.
3. cs.SY (Systems and Control) - The paper discusses the implementation of a simulation to test the proposed mechanism, which falls under the domain of systems and control.
4. cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing) - The paper may involve the use of neural networks or evolutionary algorithms in the proposed mechanism, which falls under the domain of NE.
5. cs.LG (Machine Learning) - The paper may involve the use of machine learning techniques in the proposed mechanism, which falls under the domain of LG.
